nodes.id: 江西省农产品质量安全中心

zh-cn: 江西省农产品质量安全中心
江西省绿色食品发展中心

location.zh-cn: 江西省南昌市文教路359号

description.zh-cn: 隶属于江西省农业厅的正处级全额拨款事业单位，实行“两块牌子一套人马”运行模式，负责江西省“三品一标”（无公害农产品、绿色食品、有机食品、国家农产品地理标志）的审核及认证工作。
description.en: A division-level, fully funded public institution subordinate to the Jiangxi Provincial Department of Agriculture, operating under a 'two signs, one team' model. It is responsible for the review and certification of 'Sanpin Yibiao' (Pollution-free Agricultural Products, Green Food, Organic Food, and National Geographical Indications of Agricultural Products) in Jiangxi Province.

description.zh-cn: 时任江西省农产品质量安全中心主任。
description.en: Then-Director of the Jiangxi Provincial Agro-product Quality and Safety Center.

description.zh-cn: 时任江西省农产品质量安全中心副主任。
description.en: Then-Deputy Director of the Jiangxi Provincial Agro-product Quality and Safety Center.

description.zh-cn: 时任江西省农产品质量安全中心副主任。
description.en: Then-Deputy Director of the Jiangxi Provincial Agro-product Quality and Safety Center.

description.zh-cn: 江西省人民政府的组成部门，主管全省农业与农村经济发展工作。
description.en: A constituent department of the Jiangxi Provincial People's Government, responsible for agriculture and rural economic development in the province.

description.zh-cn: 江西省机构编制委员会办公室的简称，负责行政管理体制和机构改革等工作。
description.en: Abbreviation for the Jiangxi Provincial Commission Office for Public Sector Reform, responsible for administrative system and institutional reform.

description.zh-cn: 对无公害农产品、绿色食品、有机食品、国家农产品地理标志四类农产品认证的统称。
description.en: A collective term for the certification of four types of agricultural products: Pollution-free Agricultural Products, Green Food, Organic Food, and National Geographical Indications of Agricultural Products.

nodes.id: 江西省农业厅直属机构

zh-cn: 江西省农业厅直属机构

description.zh-cn: 由江西省农业厅直接管理的事业单位或机构的类别统称。
description.en: A general category for public institutions or agencies directly managed by the Jiangxi Provincial Department of Agriculture.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国公务员的行政级别之一，与县长、区长、市属委办局长等职务对应。
description.en: An administrative rank for civil servants in the People's Republic of China, corresponding to positions such as county magistrate, district mayor, and director of municipal commissions.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国公务员的行政级别之一，低于厅局级副职，高于乡科级正职。
description.en: An administrative rank for civil servants in the People's Republic of China, below the deputy department/bureau level and above the section/township level.

description.zh-cn: 一种由政府财政承担其全部经费的事业单位，其工作人员属于事业编制。
description.en: A type of public institution whose entire budget is covered by government finance, and its staff are on the public service payroll.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国江西省的省级国家行政机关。
description.en: The provincial-level state administrative organ of Jiangxi Province, People's Republic of China.

relationships.source: 江西省农产品质量安全中心

description.zh-cn: 江西省农产品质量安全中心是隶属于江西省农业厅的单位。
description.en: The Jiangxi Provincial Agro-product Quality and Safety Center is an organization subordinate to the Jiangxi Provincial Department of Agriculture.

relationships.target: 江西省农产品质量安全中心

description.zh-cn: 江西省农产品质量安全中心于2010年11月25日经江西省编办正式批复成立。
description.en: The Jiangxi Provincial Agro-product Quality and Safety Center was formally approved for establishment by the Jiangxi Provincial Commission Office for Public Sector Reform on November 25, 2010.

relationships.target: 江西省农产品质量安全中心

description.zh-cn: 邱水平担任江西省农产品质量安全中心的主任。
description.en: Qiu Shuiping serves as the Director of the Jiangxi Provincial Agro-product Quality and Safety Center.

relationships.target: 江西省农产品质量安全中心

description.zh-cn: 熊晨担任江西省农产品质量安全中心的副主任。
description.en: Xiong Chen serves as a Deputy Director of the Jiangxi Provincial Agro-product Quality and Safety Center.

relationships.target: 江西省农产品质量安全中心

description.zh-cn: 万文根担任江西省农产品质量安全中心的副主任。
description.en: Wan Wengen serves as a Deputy Director of the Jiangxi Provincial Agro-product Quality and Safety Center.

relationships.source: 江西省农产品质量安全中心

description.zh-cn: 江西省农产品质量安全中心负责对江西省的“三品一标”进行审核及认证，推动其发展和管理。
description.en: The Jiangxi Provincial Agro-product Quality and Safety Center is responsible for the review and certification of 'Sanpin Yibiao' in Jiangxi Province, promoting its development and management.

relationships.source: 江西省农产品质量安全中心
relationships.target: 江西省农业厅直属机构

description.zh-cn: 根据其机构类型，江西省农产品质量安全中心是江西省农业厅的直属机构之一。
description.en: According to its institutional type, the Jiangxi Provincial Agro-product Quality and Safety Center is one of the institutions directly under the Jiangxi Provincial Department of Agriculture.

relationships.source: 江西省农产品质量安全中心

description.zh-cn: 江西省农产品质量安全中心的行政级别被定为正县处级。
description.en: The administrative rank of the Jiangxi Provincial Agro-product Quality and Safety Center is designated as County-level Director Grade.

relationships.source: 江西省农产品质量安全中心

description.zh-cn: 江西省农产品质量安全中心是一个正处级单位。
description.en: The Jiangxi Provincial Agro-product Quality and Safety Center is a Division-level director grade unit.

relationships.source: 江西省农产品质量安全中心

description.zh-cn: 江西省农产品质量安全中心属于全额拨款事业单位类型。
description.en: The Jiangxi Provincial Agro-product Quality and Safety Center is categorized as a fully funded public institution.

relationships.target: 江西省农产品质量安全中心

description.zh-cn: 江西省农产品质量安全中心的官方印章由江西省人民政府制发。
description.en: The official seal of the Jiangxi Provincial Agro-product Quality and Safety Center is made and issued by the Jiangxi Provincial People's Government.
